title: Treebeard, Oldest Living Thing (4C104)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Ally • Home 2T & 8T • Ent
Strength:	12
Vitality:	4
Site:	2T, 8T
Game Text:	Unhasty. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and discard an unbound companion from hand to heal an unbound companion.
Lore:	”'No, I am not tired. I do not easily get tired. And I do not sit down. I am not very, hm, bendable.'”
Rarity:	C
